climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🏆【Innovative Ergonomic Bed Pillow for Side Sleeper】The curve pillows are designed to fit around your shoulder and neck tightly, the special shape makes the pillow cradle your head and neck in the neutral spine alignment, with no pressure points under your shoulder. This orthopedic pillow will help you relieve neck pain or stiff. Besides, the memory faom pillow is also perfect for back and stomach sleepers to get peaceful and restorative sleep

❄️【Cooling Bed Pillows with Bamboo Rayon Pillowcase】Firebrighting ultimate comfortable pillowcase features two different sides for your dual choice. Cool-fabric surface makes cool feeling to touch, keeps your pillows dry for a cooling comfort. Bamboo Viscose surface enables to be ultra soft like laying down on a plush, airy cloud, helps dissipate heat from your skin; These cooling pillows make you cool down during all seasons long.

🌙【Adjustable Pillow for Your Perfect Loft】The zipped covers allow you to remove or add the extra shredded memory foam filling achieve your own personal, unique balance of comfort and support, without compromising on quality or luxury. You can rest assured there comes with a bag of additional filling for your choice, no matter you prefer a soft, medium, firm even extra-firm pillow.

🥇【Premium Memory Foam Pillow】Compared with traditional memory foam, our white-blue shredded memory foam come from top quality memory foam bed topper, which are more breathable and supportive. Comfortable pillow inner filling provide perfect gentle support for your neck and head, and they will be never be flat. So the ideal pillow allows you to nestle in and supports you from rolling forward or backward

👍🏼【Multi-use,Not A Bed Pillow Only】The queen size curved pillow fits your shoulder line perfectly, which can also be used as body pillow, knee pillow, leg pillow, throw pillow, pregnant pillow and so on. If you like travelling, you can take it anywhere and the shaped pillow for neck pain is suitable for all seasons

🌙【Unique Moon and Star. Pattern Patent】 The pillowcase is designed with Moon and Star. pattern(Registration number: VA0002326774). Features 3D zone inter-layer design to make super fluffy comforts feeling. Besides, the luxury cervical pillow for neck pain relief can creates a romantic sleeping environment, which can also improve your bedroom decoration class, creating a warm,cozy and happy sleeping environment
❤️【Easy-Care】The hypoallergenic bed pillow cover is removable and machine washable. Machine wash in cold to warm water. Do not bleach. Do not use fabric softer. Tumble dry low heat

❤️【Warm Tips】1.Before first use, gentle slap and leave the memory foam on for 12-24 hours until the pillow is fully inflated. The new memory foam itself has a very light smell, if you can't accept it, please ventilate it for 3-5 days; 2. For keeping the pillow fluffed up everyday, pls turn it end-over-end lengthwise and give it a few fluffing movements with your hands across its width, we hope you sleep like a baby

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A perfect Memory Foam Side Sleeper Pillow for neck pain relief is a must-have! Every cube of memory foam shredded comes from "Blue Sky and White Clouds Memory Foam" which usually used for bed mattress. The special design creates romantic and fresh natural feeling for your sleeping.

Previous page Every cube of memory foam comes from "Blue Sky & White Clouds Memory Foam" which used for mattress. No more neck pain every morningNo more wake up sore and stiff No more tossing and turning all nightNo more shoulder discomfort when sleeping Next page 1 Premium material 2 Cooling & Bamboo 3 Enjoy comfort 4 Mini / Travel option

The ergonomic shape designed to relieve neck and shoulder pain, muscle tension Curve Neck Pillow curves and swerves just like your body to give those places the right shaped support and comfort. Ideal for the head and neck, but also great for the pelvis, knees or ankles. Keep this pillow safe and secure … it will be your favorite – and others’ too
Previous page Next page 1 For side sleeper 2 For back sleeper 3 For stomach sleeper 4 Multi-use knee pillow 5 Resting pillow
Ideal support while sleeping, reclining or reading. great for knee or ankle Previous page Next page

Excellent Gifts for Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Valentine's Day, Christmas Day... For keeping the pillow fluffed up, to turn your memory foam pillow each morning end-over-end lengthwise and give it a few fluffing movements with your hands across its width. You will sleep like a baby. Generally speaking, it takes 1-2 days to find a suitable sleep height and hardness. 1 2 3 4
Previous page Next page HOW TO MAKE THE PILLOW FLUFFY 1 Press 2 Squeeze 3 Pat 4 Shape as before

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the greatest pillow with ability to adjust the support. The curve design makes it more comfortable for a side sleeper. The covers are of high quality material. I would like to be able to purchase additional covers because of their design, but the manufacture says covers only are not available. I highly recommend these pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is everything the description says. Love the side sleep pillow with cooling feature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable! I am happy I purchased these. They helped my neck pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: Not happy with this at all there is barely any stuffing you have to assemble your self and with the stuffing provided it barely fills the pillow . We will have to buy more stuffing . If you like flat pillows this the perfect buy lol. Don’t recommend not comfortable at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little harder than I would like and not wicking. The shape is perfect for a side sleeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a pillow for side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: This is the pillow I have been search for years. I brough so many different pillows that claimed to be for side sleeper like me, but nothing has been working. I have not have good night sleep for a long time. I am actually able to sleep throught the night and not have pain on my shoulder, my neck or headache since I have this. Super happy with this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was in need of another cooling pillow. So I seen a good deal on this pillow and grabbed it for her. She loves it. Soft but not too soft and big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only received One Pillow.
reviews.reviewText: The pillow itself is fine. But, I was supposed to receive two pillows and only one came in the box.Edit: The seller has reached out to me and is sending another pillow. I've updated the rating to 5 stars to reflect both the product and the seller.
These allow me to have a better night sleep as the support in them is great for any position
This is a amazing pillow, best I have ever bought.
Fantastic pillow, somewhat firm but still able to mould to your liking, personally I love it. Comes with extra stuffing if needed!

I removed over half of the filling in this pillow before I could even try it. In the end - while it is a comfortable pillow - it is not really suitable for a side sleeper. The indented area is not deep enough to provide support for your neck and spine. However, I am keeping to use as my body pillow as surprisingly the pillow stays cool against my front unlike my previous one.

reviews.reviewTitle: OUPS! CHEAP ZIPPER ... VERY TO BAD.
reviews.reviewText: Je viens juste de recevoir cet oreiller souhaitée. J'ai bien lu les écrits des évaluations sur le site Amz avant mon achat... Convaincue de cet achat...Pour mon confort personnel, je veux retirer quelques fibres de l'oreiller... Mais le zipper de la taie est remplie de mousse et de fils! Très fragile cette fermeture (zipper)... Difficile d'ouvrir la taie du rembourrage.Au final, avec délicatesse, je tente de retirer la mousse et de faire glisser le zipper... Malheureusement le zipper ne se reserre plus de gauche à droite... Ça reste ouvert. Mais quel dommage !La mousse se répand donc facilement !En bref, je n'ai même pas le temps de trouver le bon confort de cet oreiller pour moi à cause d'un zipper qui me lâche dès le début !!! Ça vaut malheureusement une cote de 3 sur 5. SVP, changer votre zipper pour une meilleure qualité ! MERCI de me lire.
